introduction: Fentanyl hits your brain in seconds, numbing pain and flooding you with euphoria. But it's up to fif

vocabulary.definition: a feeling or state of intense excitement and happiness
vocabulary.example: After winning the championship, he was filled with euphoria.

vocabulary.definition: an excessive and dangerous dose of a drug
vocabulary.example: She nearly died from an overdose of painkillers.

vocabulary.definition: relying on someone or something for support or aid
vocabulary.example: He became dependent on pain medication after the accident.

vocabulary.definition: the action or practice of inflicting severe pain or suffering on someone
vocabulary.example: The prisoner endured days of torture before finally confessing.

vocabulary.definition: deprived of the power of sensation
vocabulary.example: Her fingers felt numb from the cold.

vocabulary.definition: having knowledge or perception of a situation or fact
vocabulary.example: She was aware of the potential dangers of the experiment.
